_header: Matthew had made a great gestening
_description: Mathew’s Feast (Matt. IX. 10) — a single couplet

BLHar7322.Transcription: Matheu hat mad a gret gestenygto Ihesu at home in his whonyyg
BLHar7322.Note: Written in verse lines though inserted into Latin prose text.
